text:
6. The JFK Assassination

The assassination of President John F. Kennedy has been subject to various

conspiracy theories, including claims that the CIA, FBI, or other entities were

involved in a plot to kill him (Warren Commission, 1964). Proponents argue

that the "magic bullet" theory and the lack of evidence linking Lee Harvey

Oswald to the crime are evidence of a larger conspiracy. However, experts

have thoroughly debunked these claims, citing the overwhelming evidence
